pkgmetadata.longdescription: Creates a Neighbourhood Using Locality Sensitive Hashing for Gaussian Projections // Uses locality sensitive hashing and creates a neighbourhood graph for a data set and calculates the adjusted rank index value for the same. It uses Gaussian random planes to decide the nature of a given point. Datar, Mayur, Nicole Immorlica, Piotr Indyk, and Vahab S. Mirrokni(2004) doi:10.1145/997817.997857.
